properties.name: AutoPlacement
properties.description: Indicates whether the host accepts any untargeted instance launches that match its instance type configuration, or if it only accepts Host tenancy instance launches that specify its unique host ID.

type.description: Indicates whether the host accepts any untargeted instance launches that match its instance type configuration, or if it only accepts Host tenancy instance launches that specify its unique host ID.

properties.name: AvailabilityZone
properties.description: The Availability Zone in which to allocate the Dedicated Host.

type.description: The Availability Zone in which to allocate the Dedicated Host.

properties.name: HostRecovery
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable host recovery for the Dedicated Host. Host recovery is disabled by default.

type.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable host recovery for the Dedicated Host. Host recovery is disabled by default.

properties.name: InstanceType
properties.description: Specifies the instance type to be supported by the Dedicated Hosts. If you specify an instance type, the Dedicated Hosts support instances of the specified instance type only.

type.description: Specifies the instance type to be supported by the Dedicated Hosts. If you specify an instance type, the Dedicated Hosts support instances of the specified instance type only.

properties.name: InstanceFamily
properties.description: Specifies the instance family to be supported by the Dedicated Hosts. If you specify an instance family, the Dedicated Hosts support multiple instance types within that instance family.

type.description: Specifies the instance family to be supported by the Dedicated Hosts. If you specify an instance family, the Dedicated Hosts support multiple instance types within that instance family.

properties.name: OutpostArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Outpost on which to allocate the Dedicated Host.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Outpost on which to allocate the Dedicated Host.

properties.name: HostMaintenance
properties.description: Automatically allocates a new dedicated host and moves your instances on to it if a degradation is detected on your current host.

type.description: Automatically allocates a new dedicated host and moves your instances on to it if a degradation is detected on your current host.

properties.name: AssetId
properties.description: The ID of the Outpost hardware asset.
